text: Wait... So we could have just used disguises and avoided violence all along?
Technically - yes. But where would the drama be? It's boring to just walk around in costumes like it's a carnival.
Are you serious? All this chaos and destruction... just because you're bored?!
In the afterlife, you have to entertain yourself somehow. Besides, reports about 'creative problem solving' look much more interesting than 'passed through unnoticed'.
